posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for?
Moderator on TTT

2) How old are you? (if you prefer to say this in private, just ask): REDACTED

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone):
Arizona, USA - GMT(UTC-7:00)

4) Current In-Game Name:
NutterButter

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community page:
STEAM_0:0:30630420 http://steamcommunity.com/id/NuttrButtr

7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers:
I have been involved with NNJG for quite a long time, though I can't honestly give a date. I have been active for the past three or four months, though.

8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)?: Moderation in TTT

9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?:
I came back to NNJG(again) three-four months ago, playing for a day and then going on a two-week vacation. During this time I was demoted for inactivity. I have no problem with the demotion, since I was inactive for quite a while, and so I patiently waited for mod apps to re-open. Now that they have I'm formally making a request for mod again, I enjoy this server and its community and would like to help keep it that way.

10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for:
Yes, I do. I was moderator before I went inactive.

11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it:
I own a decent mic, but I have never used it on TTT.

12) Any other Comments or information you can provide:
Recommendations!

Unfortunately, we are unable to accept your application at this time. We are sorry for the delay in response.
